Base widget¶

Base module to be used by all the llrf widgets.

class llrfgui.widgets.basellrfwidget.BaseLLRFWidget(parent=None)[source]¶

Base class to be used by any other LLRF widget. It provides the basic interface.

_connect_all_attributes(*args, **kws)[source]¶

Private method in charge of connect a list of tango attributes with their correspondent widget.

_create_attributes_lists(*args, **kws)[source]¶

Create empty lists for the tango attributes that will be connected to the internal widgets.

_set_comboboxes(*args, **kws)[source]¶

Method to set comboboxes models. By default is void, and it should be implemented by the widget itself.

connect_attribute(*args, **kws)[source]¶

Method to connect a single tango attribute with a widget.

connect_combobox(*args, **kws)[source]¶

Method to connect a single combobox with its tango attribute

connect_signals(*args, **kws)[source]¶

Method to connect QT signals with methods. By default is void, and it should be implemented by the widget itself.

connect_with_devices(*args, **kws)[source]¶

This method creates the tango device proxys. To be overwritten if needed.

setModel(*args, **kws)[source]¶

Set the model of the widget. This method could be overwritten if needed due to a different model (i.e. widgets with a list of devices as model)

Parameters:model (str) – Model to be set.
